semantic_title: Use of Code O94 for Sequelae of Pregnancy, Childbirth, and Puerperium Complications
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 15. Chapter 15: Pregnancy, Childbirth, and the Puerperium > p. Code O94, Sequelae of complication of pregnancy, childbirth, and the puerperium > 1) Code O94

content.full_text: Code O94, Sequelae of complication of pregnancy, childbirth, and the puerperium, is for use in those cases when an initial complication of a pregnancy develops a sequela or sequelae requiring care or treatment at a future date. (Evidence: pg no: 70, L32-L35)
content.summary: Code O94 is used when initial pregnancy complications develop sequelae requiring future care or treatment. (Evidence: pg no: 70, L32-L35)
key_concepts: Sequelae of pregnancy complications (Evidence: pg no: 70, L32)
Future care requirements (Evidence: pg no: 70, L34-L35)
Initial complication development (Evidence: pg no: 70, L33-L34)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use O94 when initial pregnancy complication develops sequelae requiring future care (Evidence: pg no: 70, L32-L35)
detailed_rules.explanation: This code is specifically for cases where an original pregnancy complication has resulted in ongoing effects that need medical attention at a later time (Evidence: pg no: 70, L33-L35)

workflow_steps: Step 3: Verify future care/treatment is required

specific_codes.description: Sequelae of complication of pregnancy, childbirth, and the puerperium (Evidence: pg no: 70, L32-L33)
specific_codes.context: When initial pregnancy complications develop sequelae requiring future care

breakdown.O94: Sequelae of pregnancy, childbirth, and puerperium complications

coding_scenarios.scenario: Patient presents for treatment of ongoing effects from previous pregnancy complication
coding_scenarios.documentation_example: Patient has chronic condition resulting from previous pregnancy complication requiring ongoing treatment
step_by_step: Step 2: Confirm it resulted from pregnancy complication

correct_coding.rationale: Sequela codes are sequenced following the code describing the sequelae (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)

incorrect_coding.rationale: O94 should follow the sequela code, not be primary
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Using O94 as primary diagnosis instead of sequencing after sequela code

warnings: Must have documented sequelae from initial pregnancy complication (Evidence: pg no: 70, L33-L35)
best_practices: Ensure proper sequencing with sequela code first (Evidence: pg no: 70, L39-L40)
common_mistakes: Using O94 as primary diagnosis instead of secondary
tips: Code can be used at any time after initial postpartum period (Evidence: pg no: 70, L37)
implementation_notes: Requires documentation of causal relationship between original complication and current sequela
clinical_context: Used for long-term follow-up of pregnancy complications
